title: Cory Booker | Beto O'Rourke | Trump Lies About Robert Mueller’s Testimony: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump lying about Robert Mueller’s congressional testimony.

Then, hear Seth's interviews with presidential hopefuls Cory Booker and Beto O'Rourke.
